fig = px.bar(
       x=df.nlargest(columns='IMDb', n=10)['IMDb'].values,
       y=df.nlargest(columns='IMDb', n=10)['Title'].values,
       orientation='h',
       labels = {'x': "Rating", 'y':"Movie Titles"},
